data.title: Names that feel like Wells, Tripp, Grant.. etc
data.meta_description:
Hi! 
We have a little boy named Wells and we’re trying to settle on a name for baby boy #2. I love Tripp but we know at least 3 little boys with that name in our very small town. Grant I love as well but my husband does …
data.text:
[name_m]Hi[/name_m]!

We have a little boy named [name_m]Wells[/name_m] and we’re trying to settle on a name for baby boy #2. I love [name_m]Tripp[/name_m] but we know at least 3 little boys with that name in our very small town. [name_m]Grant[/name_m] I love as well but my husband does not.

I want his middle name to be [name_u]Dane[/name_u].

So excited to see what ideas you have!

Thank you!!!

[name_u]Hayes[/name_u]

[name_u]Banks[/name_u]

[name_u]Rhodes[/name_u]

[name_u]Palmer[/name_u]

[name_m]Westley[/name_m]

Names like [name_m]Wells[/name_m], [name_m]Tripp[/name_m] and Grant…

[name_m]Ford[/name_m]

[name_m]Oslo[/name_m]

[name_u]Beck[/name_u]

[name_m]Byron[/name_m]

[name_m]Lance[/name_m]

[name_u]Welcome[/name_u]!

ouch that’s hard to have so many in a small town. I grew up in a small town and was thankful to be the only one with my name when there were like 3 Jessicas, etc.

I love [name_u]Dane[/name_u]! Maybe…

Other G names?

[name_m]Gerard[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Gregory[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]George[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Gentry[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Giles[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u] (this matches particularly well with [name_m]Wells[/name_m] IMO)

Other similar vibed names to [name_m]Wells[/name_m] (sophisticated yet very wearable in modern day):

[name_m]Matthias[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Irving[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Edwin[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Thurston[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Wallace[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

Hopefully these help

If you love [name_m]Tripp[/name_m] but can’t use because of the popularity:

[name_m]Kipp[/name_m]

[name_m]Rip[/name_m]

[name_m]Phillip[/name_m]

[name_u]Kit[/name_u]

I personally love [name_m]Grant[/name_m] . But maybe something similar could work

[name_m]Graham[/name_m]

[name_m]Brant[/name_m] / [name_m]Brandt[/name_m]

[name_m]Garrett[/name_m]

[name_m]Garrick[/name_m]

Other names that remind me of [name_m]Wells[/name_m]

[name_u]Hudson[/name_u]

[name_u]Sawyer[/name_u]

[name_u]Wesley[/name_u]

[name_u]Brooks[/name_u]

[name_u]Miller[/name_u]

[name_m]Harte[/name_m]

[name_u]Noah[/name_u]

Whit/ [name_u]Witt[/name_u]

[name_u]Adler[/name_u]

If you like [name_m]Tripp[/name_m], I wonder if you’d like [name_m]Truett[/name_m]? I think it fits with [name_m]Wells[/name_m] and flows nicely with [name_u]Dane[/name_u]!

[name_m]Truett[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u] - I think it is quite handsome

Other ideas

[name_u]Beckett[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Brooks[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Wilder[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Walker[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Ryker[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Fletcher[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Finley[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Tate[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Tatum[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Clark[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Carter[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_m]Harrison[/name_m] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

[name_u]Everett[/name_u] [name_u]Dane[/name_u]

I was going to suggest [name_m]Hayes[/name_m], as I’ve seen [name_m]Hayes[/name_m] and [name_m]Wells[/name_m] mentioned together in different forums…but I don’t like [name_m]Hayes[/name_m] [name_m]Dane[/name_m].

So, I’m going to suggest…

[name_m]Wells[/name_m] and [name_m]Parker[/name_m]

[name_m]Wells[/name_m] and [name_m]Brooks[/name_m]

[name_m]Wells[/name_m] and Trice

[name_m]Wells[/name_m] and [name_f]Palmer[/name_f]

[name_m]Wells[/name_m] and [name_m]Ridge[/name_m]

[name_m]Wells[/name_m] and [name_m]Abel[/name_m]

I don’t know if I love all of those options with [name_m]Dane[/name_m] as a middle, either, but I think it could work if you’re set on that for a middle.
